channel.title: watch on Noboru Saito's page
channel.description: Recent content in watch on Noboru Saito's page

item.title: Watch files with ov
item.description: ov supports watch mode, which reads files at regular intervals. The file is added every specified time. ov --watch 1 /proc/meminfo At that time, add formfeed (\f) instead of EOF. watch mode automatically sets follow-section “\f”.
